text: Robert Dale Springer (January 17, 1933 â€“ August 19, 2021) was a lieutenant general in the United States Air Force. He was vice commander in chief, Military Airlift Command from 1987 to 1988 and inspector general of the Air Force from 1985 to 1987. He was born in Millheim, Pennsylvania. Springer died on August 19, 2021 in Palmyra, Pennsylvania at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American generals Category:Military people from Pennsylvania
title: Robert D. Springer
